department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
short_summary: Supply arrangement for general contractor services for various work at 715 Peel building in Montreal and 1001 St-Laurent building in Longueuil.
description: A request for supply arrangement for the services of a general contractor for various work at the 715 Peel building in Montreal and to the 1001 St-Laurent building in Longueuil.
full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement
#### Request for Supply Arrangement (SA) to Contract a General Contractor SA-715 Peel - 1001 St-Laurent

#### *Reference:** WS3863259817-Doc4424265981
#### *Publication Date:** February 2, 2024
#### *Tender Closing Date:** March 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
#### *Expected Contract Start Date:** To be determined within the framework of the Supply Arrangement (SA)
#### *Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
#### *Procurement Category:** Construction services (72121400)

**Request Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing this Request for Supply Arrangement (SA) to contract a general contractor for various works at the 715 Peel building in Montreal and the 1001 St-Laurent building in Longueuil.

**Supply Arrangement (SA) Explanation**

A Supply Arrangement (SA) is a framework agreement between Public Works and Government Services Canada and suppliers for the provision of established goods and services. This SA allows for the solicitation of bids from a pool of pre-qualified suppliers for specific projects requiring general contractor services.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria**

To be eligible for this Supply Arrangement, interested firms must meet specific requirements outlined in the solicitation document. Suppliers will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the project requirements, demonstrate a suitable level of experience, and adhere to the terms and conditions outlined in the contract.

**Application and Qualification Procedure**

Firms interested in becoming a qualified supplier under this SA must submit their application to the designated supply officer, Joël Lussier (joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). Applicants will be notified of the qualification procedure.

**Important Dates and Information**

* Tender Closing Date: March 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined within the framework of the Supply Arrangement (SA)
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Joël Lussier
	+ Email: joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please refer to the official tender notice URL for additional information and requirements: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18691204?extsite=MTg2OTEyMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA
